scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run download:js
scripts.download:js: curl -L -o alpine.js https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/alpinejs@3.13.3/dist/cdn.min.js && curl -L -o supabase.js https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@supabase/supabase-js@2 && curl -L -o chart.js https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/chart.js && curl -L -o confetti.js https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/canvas-confetti@1.9.2/dist/confetti.browser.min.js
